entry.title: Armenian security chief accuses Russia of giving Nagorno-Karabakh to Azerbaijan

media:group.media:title: Armenian security chief accuses Russia of giving Nagorno-Karabakh to Azerbaijan
media:group.media:description:
๐ Armenian Security Council chief Armen Grigoryan said Azerbaijan has sent Armenia its latest version of proposals for a normalization deal, but has not responded to Armeniaโs offer to create a joint investigation mechanism for allegations of ceasefire violations. ๐ Grigoryan also accused Russia of having given Nagorno-Karabakh to Azerbaijan. ๐ Russia warns membership in the European Union is not compatible with the Eurasian Economic Union, which Armenia is already a member of. ๐ English subtitles on saffron video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6BAKzqE1DiM

media:group.media:title: Restoring Yereruyk, Armeniaโs ancient basilica
media:group.media:description:
Join CivilNet on a visit to the ancient Armenian basilica of Yereruyk, dating back to the late fourth century. Located a few kilometers southeast of medieval Ani, near Turkeyโs border, this historic site has endured various threats, such as a collapsed roof in the 17th century and the devastating 1988 earthquake. Restoration efforts are underway to preserve this national heritage, but proper preservation comes with unique challenges.

ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีจ ีฆึีธึึีฅีฌ ีง ิฑึึีกีญีซ ีฟีกึีกีฎึีกีตีซีถ ีฏีกีผีกีพีกึีดีกีถ ึ ีฅีถีฉีกีฏีกีผีธึึีพีกีฎึีถีฅึีซ ีถีกีญีฏีซีถ ีถีกีญีกึีกึ, ิฑึึีกีญีซ ีญีธึีฐึีคีกึีกีถีซ ีถีกีญีฏีซีถ ีบีกีฟีฃีกีดีกีพีธึ ีีกีตีฏ ิฝีกีถีธึีดีตีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ: ีีซีดีถีกีฏีกีถ ีฉีฅีดีกีถีฅึีถ ีฅีถี ีฐีธึีถีซีฝีซ 21-ีซีถ ิตึึีกีถีธึีด ิฑึึีกีญีซ ีถีฅึีฏีกีตีกึีธึึีนีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฟีกึีกีฎึีธึีด ีี ีซึีกีพีกีบีกีฐีถีฅึีซ ีดีกีฝีถีกีฏึีธึีฉีตีกีดีข ีฟีฅีฒีซ ีธึีถีฅึีกีฎ ีคีฅีบึีจ, ีกึึีกีญึีซีถีฅึีซ ีถีฏีกีฟีดีกีดีข ีฟีกึีกีฎีพีธีฒ ีกีฟีฅีฌีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีญีธีฝึีจ ึ ีกึึีกีญึีซีถีฅึีซ ีขีถีกีฏีกึีกีถีกีตีซีถ ีกีบีกีฐีธีพีดีกีถ ีบีฅีฟีกีฏีกีถ ีฎึีกีฃีซึีจึ

entry.title: Propelling Armenia Into the ranks of innovation

media:group.media:title: Propelling Armenia Into the ranks of innovation
media:group.media:description:
In this episode, Mary Papazian, co-founder of the Armenian Society of Fellows, sits down to discuss plans to strengthen the development of scientific research in Armenia through educational reforms. She also discusses the knowledge resources of the global Armenian diaspora. She outlines strategies for transforming Armenia into a regional leader in innovation by empowering a new generation of scientists, and fostering Armenia-diaspora collaboration.

media:group.media:description:
ิดีกีฟีกึีกีถีถีฅึีธึีด ีกีฆีกีฟีธึีฉีตีธึีถีซึ ีฆึีฏีพีกีฎ ีกีถีฑีกีถึ ีชีกีดีกีถีกีฏีกีพีธึ ีบีกีฐีดีกีถ ีพีกีตึีฅึีจ ีทีกึีธึีถีกีฏีธึีด ีฅีถ ีกึีชีกีถีกีบีกีฟีพีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีถีพีกีฝีฟีกึีถีธีฒ ีดีถีกีฌ. ีฝีก ีดีกึีคีธึ ีซึีกีพีธึีถึีถีฅึีซ ีบีกีทีฟีบีกีถ ิฑีถีกีฐีซีฟ ีีกีถีกีฝีตีกีถีซ ีฃีถีกีฐีกีฟีกีฏีกีถีถ ีงึ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีซ ิณึีธึีฃ ินีธีฝีธึีถีตีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฆึีธึีตึีธึีด ีถีก ีญีธีฝีฅีฌ ีง ีถีกึ ีกีฟีฅีฌีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีญีธีฝึีซ ีดีกีฝีซีถี ีฏีธีน ีกีถีฅีฌีธีพ ีฐีกีถึีกีตีซีถ ีฃีธึีฎีซีนีถีฅึีซีถ ีฐีกีดีกีญีดีขีพีกีฎ ีบีกีตึีกึีฅีฌ ีคึีก ีคีฅีด, ีฐีกีฏีกีผีกีฏ ีคีฅีบึีธึีด, ีฐีฅีฟึีกีถึีถีฅึีจ ีธีฒีขีฅึีฃีกีฏีกีถ ีฏีฌีซีถีฅีถึ

entry.title: Armeniaโs recognition of Palestine welcomed by Turkey and Arab states

media:group.media:title: Armeniaโs recognition of Palestine welcomed by Turkey and Arab states
media:group.media:description:
